description: Memories and landmarks of Jerry Sandusky’s past are scattered throughout his hometown of Washington, Pa.
title: Sandusky’s Roots
title_page: Sandusky’s Roots - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 10,
Portions of Jerry Sandusky’s past can be found in his hometown of Washington, Pa. A newspaper clipping with a photo of a 10-year-old Sandusky seated before a boxing team is on the wall at the Brownson House recreation center. Sandusky, a former defensive coordinator at Penn State, has been charged with sexually assaulting eight boys.
